title: (4660) Resende - 813 Rua José Monteiro
description: The view is great, but there is a lot of traffic and it can be very busy on working days, as it is very used by locals

title: (4660-206) Resende - 35 Bairro Lapa e Nápoles
description: I was looking for a place far from civilization, and it's great, I'll have dinner on the street and stay until tomorrow.

title: (4660) Resende -
description: A small road that runs along the Douro on the left bank. A few narrow places. For a van, it's ok but the U-turn remains complicated. Nearby there is a pier for boats, and there is more room. The place is beautiful.

title: (4640) Baião - Unnamed Road
description: Heavenly place with a beach by the river. Three picnic tables, but no shade. Ideal for a swimming day.

title: (4660-344) S. João da Fontoura - M5
description: Parking with possibility to fill water. Not sure for 100% that it’s drinking water, but looks good, with good pressure and connection. There are narrow roads to access this point, can be difficult for wider camps. (Our is 2,4m)

title: (4640) Santa M.nha do Zêzere - 131 Rua 20 de Junho
title_short: (4640) Santa M.nha do Zêzere - 131 Rua 20 de Junho
description: A big square with lots of parking slots. Next to the parking area is a playground, soccer field, a park with benches and a bar. The road is closed, but you can still enter to the square.

title: () - EM552
description: Picnic area on the banks of the Douro, free parking, catering possible at the bar-restaurant in the village of Porto de Rei. Water point, swimming in the river possible or swimming pool.

title: (4660) Miomães - 68 Avenida Doutor Correia Pinto
description: Parking on the banks of the Douro, opposite the thermal baths, near the marina, very easy access, we did not stay at night but it should not pose any difficulty

title: (4660) Miomães - 140 Rua de Vila Nazaré
description: Clean drinkable water

title: (4660) Miomães - 1862 N222
description: Parking in the marina, in front of the office of tourism, near the hot spring and baths. Games for children. Great view of the Douro, quieter than near the bar. Empty parking lot off season (March).

title: () - Unnamed Road
description: Great place for a night of absolute calm, this has been a real pleasure for us. There are toilets but closed that day, a water tap, is she drinking? Plenty of room. A stone stairway leads to a remarkable views of the Douro Valley. The site is perfectly accessible to the motorhome by narrow roads but passes it hassle-free.

title: (4660) São Martinho de Mouros - 516 Rua do Monte do Calvário
title_short: (4660) São Martinho de Mouros - 516 Rua do Monte do Calvário
description: In the middle of the mountains in the Douro valley In the parking lot of a religious building overlooking the valley possibility of staying for a meal break. Thank you for leaving the place spotless, it is a religious place

title: (5040) Matos - Bairro Doutor Sá Carneiro
description: Miradouro of São Silvestre Cimo do Douro. At the end of a very narrow and very steep road (only for small vehicles). Extraordinary panorama and calm. If you are not the first, be the second ... after that would be too crowded :-) No services, provide water ...

title: (5040) Vila Jusã - 614 N108
description: Magnificent source of drinking and fresh water with parking space. Although it does not have a sign, the neighbors have told us that it is drinkable.

title: (4660) bernardo - 914 EM537

title: (5040) Mesão Frio - N101

name: Camping "Quinta das Corujeiras"
title: (4640) Camping "Quinta das Corujeiras"
description: Camping "Quinta das Corujeiras" A campsite offering only one place for a small van, rather difficult to access but in the middle of the vineyards: reservation highly recommended. Great location with hammock available. Showers and toilets very clean. No services for camper. Very welcome with proposal for a ride in the middle of a river to reach a small waterfall. Bread order possible.

title: (4640) Campelo - R. Abel Ribeiro

title: (5040) Mesão Frio - 305 Caminho Jardim

description: I discovered this watering hole along the rota de romanico. The water tastes good and you can probably even wash clothes and/or dishes here. There is a large parking lot opposite.

title: (4640-187) Baião - 127 Rua Camões

New and free motorhomearea.

title: (5100) - N226

title: (5100) Lamego - Av. Dom Jacinto Botelho

title: (4690) Cinfães -
description:
If you are visiting Northern Portugal, we also invite you to our paradise. Our land is 1.3 hectare big where you can park during the day and night although it is accesible mostly only with motorbikes, cars and vans because there is a 265cm wide bridge before our place which has a little bend too. But if you come without a motorhome, you can sleep here also in a tent under the starry sky. 

If you travel with your pet, he/she is welcome here too, just let us know before you come, because we also have two dogs. 

As for the toilet, we have only one compost toilet, what you can use as well. In addition, we provide water but the drinking water is limited because we bring it from a fresh spring nearby. At the moment, for electricity, we have only a solar system, which is also limited, we can charge just the usual devices with, like phones, laptop, etc.
Anyway, if you have some extra request, let us know, because we have hammocks, slack line, picnic table and cooking stuffs, like camping gas etc, what we can also offer.

If you got interested, come and swim under the waterfalls, relax and clear your mind in the nature, enjoy the sunset from a panoramic view and let's explore Cinfães and the beautiful Douro valley with its amazing features. 
The surroundings also offers many activities such as boating on the Douro river, hiking or biking in the embrace of majestic mountains, looking round the marvellous wine region, walking around the cobbled streets of the fabulous small cities and villages and much more programs.

The price applies to one vehicle and one person per night.

title: (4690) - CM1022
description: Picnic area at the edge of a small waterfall, tables, toilets, water point, bardecue. Beware, this place is on the road but not very busy. The TOP for a lunch, swimming, walking along the brook ...

title: (5100-196) Lamego - 1 N226
description: Service area in the Leclerc supermarket car park during store opening hours. A launderette on the floor below and store. DIY. Parking only during store opening hours. No possibility of sleeping at night

title: (5100-196) Lamego -
description: Gas bottle refill - E. Leclerc petrol station. They have a few old adapters but only Portuguese style. Speaking English, very nice, no issue with filling the bottle. Happy days!

name: Parque de Campismo de Mourilhe
title: (4690) Parque de Campismo de Mourilhe
description:
Mourilhe motorhome parking, camping and glamping, providing everything for a 5 star stay next to Douro River.
Prices start at 20 euros per night for a motorvan with 2 people and eletricity. 

Full price list at website

Motorhome Park | Bungalows | Restaurant | SPA | Gym | Swimming pool | Convenience store

title: (5040) Sedielos -
description: Good area in the middle of the Douro next to the Marão mountain range with beautiful ladscapes. Be sure to visit the Pituda leisure Park with beautiful river beach.

title: (4690) Cinfães - CM1022
description: Above the dam that you can cross, on a connecting road over the Duro to the north! Quiet at night, around 6 o'clock the rush hour starts! Then it gets louder! Flat place!

title: (5050-071) Godim - 6 Avenida Sacadura Cabral
description: Automatic outside laundry with free access a dryer, two washing machines. On the parking lot of intermaché by very practical for the big motorhome.

title: (5050-071) Godim - 6 Avenida Sacadura Cabral
description: There is another laundrette in the street next to that of intermarche, brand new with the advantage of being seated. 1 machine and 2 tumble dryer from .

title: (4690) - Rua de Torneiros
description: Flat concrete parking with a view of the Carrapatelo dam. The parking lot is now closed. Great views over the river. Water can be found when you leave the main road 500 meters from the car park.

title: () - Unnamed Road
description: Parking that is taking a small road at the dam. There is a steep slope to go. A small concrete parking and another further down made of sand. We were on the second with our heavy weight. Opportunity to dive your feet in the Douro following the path at the end of the second parking. Do not be afraid of the way, it's pretty rocky. 5 minutes walk

title: (4600) - 2261 N15
description: Along the river. A picnic area associated with a small tavern with toilets and non-drinking water point. Position for the night side guinguette (validated by locals). For access: paved road. A little narrow but it goes on a path. Warning: the weekend the bar is open in the summer so ... noise to predict.

title: (4690) - Unnamed Road
description: Superb spot on top of a mountain with 360 degree views of the surrounding valleys. The milieu of a wind farm wind but so tranquility assured at night and in the morning! Wind turbine noise is not annoying at all. Access is by paved road. No toilet but water points, picnic table and garbage.

title: (4690) Tendais - Unnamed Road
description: Small picnic area by the side of the road with spectacular views. Space for one or two vans.

title: (4600) Ansiães -
description: Paradisiacal place accessible by a mountain path. we discovered it because we got lost.

title: (5100-426) Lamego -
description: For one night, view of the requa bridges, quiet. Strobe light nearby in the early evening, not bothersome with curtains. Douro Museum 20min walk.

title: (4600) Ansiães - 342 EM575
description: Large parking lot in a village, very nice and very quiet to spend the night!

title: (5050) Peso da Régua - 134 Avenida da Galiza
title_short: (5050) Peso da Régua - 134 Avenida da Galiza
description: Nice car park facing the Douro with services, between the river and the shops. Paying places (with water and electricity on the square) and non-paying places (without service on the square). Complete service area next door. Go to the bar above the swimming pool for the rules and to open the blocked places.

title: () Peso da Régua - N2
description: Free section of the motorhome park. I thought I add it here separately as we always filter for free services and nearly missed this one as it is included under the paid one next door.

title: (5100) Várzea de Abrunhais - Rua dos Moinhos
title_short: (5100) Várzea de Abrunhais - Rua dos Moinhos

title: (4630) Paredes de Viadores - M584
description: Very well organized picnic area! Large car park with two entrances, without stripes. So also long campers ok. It is close to the road, so I don't know if there is any noise from cars in the evening. Excellent for a daytime stopover, with tables and grill available. Field to play. Public toilets from the main entrance. Super quiet. Maybe over the weekend it will be busier.

title: (3610) Tarouca - Unnamed Road
description: Viva Chritorei, great place, but nevertheless isolated and peaceful. Magnificent view of the valley. Closed toilets but barbecue fountain and picnic table.

title: (4690) - 88 N222
description: Tap for filling the water tank on a small picnic area

title: (4630) Freixo -
description: Louredo’s Farm                                      Organic Farm with parking lot, laundry, hot shower, electricity, point of view, animals, beautiful surroundings, organic food, etc.  We have six very friendly dogs, and they will love you!                                  PS: The entrance can be difficult for very large caravan.

title: (4690) - Er 321
description: Portas do Montemuro, great place with a 360 degree view of the valleys. next door is a gas station. little traffic in the evening. the dog yells at the gas station at night. compensated the morning after

title: (4600) Aboadela - Unnamed Road
description: Quiet (even though in  vicinity of a road) and nice place with water source and flat surface good for stopping and resting but also for spending a night. Perhaps street lights might disturb a bit. Petrol station some 300m away with the obvious service.

title: (4635) Várzea da Ovelha e Aliviada - Unnamed Road
title_short: (4635) Várzea da Ovelha e Aliviada - Unnamed Road
description:
Tranquility,  and magnificent landscape, this is our house at the gates of the beautiful and historic city of Amarante.
We would like it to be a great starting point for getting to know our beautiful region. Here are some suggestions for planning your trip.
We are located 10 minutes from the main node of national motorways that can take you to Porto, Guimarães, Braga, Vila Real, Lamego, Bragança, Chaves and many other cities of great historical and tourist interest. You may use direct public transport for some of them.
Amarante is our city. Small, with a rich historical center, crossed by the river Tâmega, cradle of the conventual sweets and center of a unique wine region, the Vinho Verde region.
And because we talk about wine, of course you can not miss the region of the Douro Valley, a landscape treasure that is the origin of the Port.
If you are nature lovers I have two suggestions of national parks: Gerês and Alvão. And, of course, the mountainous set that will be here in front, in the landscape of the terrace: the Marão.
But we will have an opportunity to talk about all this.
See you later!

title: (3610) Tarouca - 9 Rua Doutor Abel de Sousa Lira
title_short: (3610) Tarouca - 9 Rua Doutor Abel de Sousa Lira
description: Fresh water

title: (4625) Penha Longa - 3450 CM1276

Sinon une partie du parc est accessible et pourra vous faire faire une pause verte pour vos animaux.

title: (5100) - N222

title: (4630) - 2633 N210

title: (5000) - A4

title: (4600) Ansiães - Unnamed Road
description: Quiet and Nice place

title: (4625) - 1522 N108

title: (4600) Fregim - R. do Tâmega
description: It is the aquapark car park but since we have tickets for the next day I asked if we could spend the night and they told me without problem! Super spacious and super quiet.

title: (4635) Toutosa - 28 Rua Toutosa

title: (5030) - CM1244

title: (4600) Amarante - 338 N210
description: Place to spend the day or overnight. There is only space for 2 long motorhomes (7 meters), but the place is quiet, 10 minutes walk from the city center. If you can't find another place to park or sleep, this may be an alternative.

title: (4600-752) Amarante - 401 N210
description: Ample parking for large vehicles such as trucks, motorhomes, campers ... The ground is dirty but it is a place where you can park both to visit the city and to spend the night. It has no services. Next to it are the municipal swimming pools. Youth movement at night.

title: (4600) Amarante - 167 Rua das Carvalhinhas
description: Good shady parking spot. Toilets open at the end of the dirt parking section (closed in Aug 12 for a music event set up). Noisy at the weekend. Close to the river

title: (4600-014) Amarante - 374 Avenida Alexandre Herculano
description: Large free car park with spaces along the Tâmega River. Surrounded by two busy roads but quieter from midnight. Fine for one night. Trash cans in the parking lot.

title: (4600-005) Amarante - Avenida Primeiro de Maio
description:
Car park with overnight stays tolerated.
Next to Municipal Market and Market Café. Not possible on market days (Wednesday and Saturday from 04:00 - 15:00.

There are public toilets open from 08:00-20:00 and water may be available inside the market.

Lovely setting beside the river with easy access to the historic town.

Approach car park from the main road bridge. Do not let your GPS try to take you via the old bridge as the turn into the parking is nearly impossible even for our 5m van!

title: (4600-015) Amarante - 552 Avenida Alexandre Herculano
description: Parking for the joggers and walkers. Certainly not suitable for more than 4 campers, otherwise no place for visitors' cars. Peacefully quiet. Entrance from 1 side can be difficult for longer motorhomes. quiet location at night.

title: (4600-758) Amarante - 167 Rua Cândido dos Reis
description:
Park very well located, very close to the city, next to the river. Bar next door. departure of walk.
a little movement during the day but no worries.

title: (4600-752) Amarante - 188 Rua Bairro Coronel Carvalho de Lima
title_short: (4600-752) Amarante - 188 Rua Bairro Coronel Carvalho de Lima
description: A pretty spot by a rivers by a thermal bathroom and Spa which you must book to find a spot (we didn’t). Probably space for 5 vans. Felt safe and isolated, really beautiful spot with a view to a town and a nearly electric charging spot and the toilets of the thermal bath.

address.street: 188 Rua Bairro Coronel Carvalho de Lima

title: (4600-752) Amarante - 541 Largo Santa Marinha

Small car park directly on the dead end river.

title: (4600-752) Amarante - 166 Largo Santa Marinha

Access rather nothing for huge ships.

title: (4600-593) - 19 Rua José Moura Bastos
description: Tony Restaurant private parking. After an excellent dinner, we asked if we could stay in the restaurant's parking lot and the permit was given with no problem, a quiet place near the Amarante water park

title: (5110-354) Fontelo -
description: Small car park for 1 maxi motorhome / 2 or 3 vans, on the banks of the Douro. Visiting local fishermen. Ideal for a shady night with the lapping of the river.

title: (4600) - 521 Avenida Padre João Marques
description: A few places along a cobbled street with little traffic next to the old station which allows you to explore the greenway by bike. No service but a restaurant next door.

title: (3610) - Avenida António Teixeira
description: Pleasant parking for picnics. Tables and fountain. good views and shadow

title: (4540-021) Albisqueiros - 1916 N225
description: Public toilets, parking over night not recommend. there are markets in the morning.

title: (4560-055) Castelões - A4
description: Gas station parking. There is a well reserved place where you can spend the night

title: (3600) Cabril -
description: A river beach in Foz Cabril. Have the place to ourselves in mid April 2022. Facility’s available in season. Cafe, toilets, outdoor showers.

title: (4600-752) Amarante - 112 Rua Nossa Senhora de Fátima
title_short: (4600-752) Amarante - 112 Rua Nossa Senhora de Fátima
description: Quiet park. Exists near a big super market, and a restaurant. Very near of N15 road. Safe park and very well iluminated.

title: (4560) Penafiel - 260 Rua Bento Peixoto
description: Drinking water point, easy to fill water bottle

title: (4540) Alvarenga -
description:
Dark, quiet and flat field/parking
parked there over night to visit the 516arouca bridge

title: (5000) Vila Real - E82
description: "Barragem do Sordo" Calm place with a dam surrounded by mountains. Restaurants nearby. Easy access to the highway. Beautiful spot for lunch and a swim. Road was a little steep and gravel but it you take it slow it is very achievable and heaps of space to turn at the bottom. worth it!

title: (5110) Armamar - N313
description: Revolution laundromat in good working order

title: (5110) Santa Cruz -
description: Picnic area in the chapel car park. 5 tables and stone bench to eat. Quiet in the middle of apple trees. Place for 7 CC easy!

title: (3600) Castro Daire - 6 Rua Cabine
description: Parking

title: (4690) Souselo - 3138 N222
description: Nice complete area just aside EN 222 at Souselo village, with free services including toilets and showers; each plot has electricity(6A) and fresh water. 8 places for motor homes up to 8m; supermarket and restaurant at 100 m, gas station at 400 m. Picnic tables, playground for children and fitness equipment in the field. Besides place is just aside road, it is at lower level, so traffic noise does not perturb and it is reduced by night. Many thanks to the municipality of Cinfães for this very nice place, with extended view over Douro valley.

title: (4560) -
description: Great paved spot by the water with shadows and picnic areas. A bar open until midnight can cause a bit of noise at night, but it's also a great place to have a beer.

title: (3600-083) Castro Daire - 65 Rua Capitão Salgueiro Maia
title_short: (3600-083) Castro Daire - 65 Rua Capitão Salgueiro Maia
description: Easy parking above a sports field, with beautiful views and no lighting. Located in a quiet residential area, uncrowded at night, little traffic in the morning, some dogs barking at night. Not the most charming place, but good enough for one night.

title: (3600-136) Castro Daire - 89 Avenida António Serrado
description: Just off an n2 roundabout, 10 minutes walk into the town. Car park shaded by trees. There are picnic benches to sit at.  Day parking only.  we have a 7m motor home, and as car park, was pretty empty could manoeuvre without a problem.  if car park is busy, then probably more suited to a smaller camper van.

title: (4560) - Rua do Salgueiral
description: Small earthen car park just above the spot on the edge of the Drouo. No service but allows you to spend a quiet night away from the bar which al ere to sing all evening on this Saturday. Place flat and quite far from the road. So pretty cool

name: Quinta do Roncão | Vinhos & Azeite Douro | Visitas & Provas
title: (5050-341) Quinta do Roncão | Vinhos & Azeite Douro | Visitas & Provas
title_short: (5050-341) Quinta do Roncão | Vinhos & Azeite Douro | Visitas & Provas
description:
Located about 5 min drive from São Leonardo de Galafura viewpoint, this property of 23 hectares provides 3 parking spots for motorhomes with a beautiful view to vineyards and forest. The visitor is welcome to stay overnight after a purchase.
Private guided tours to the property with tasting of wines and olive oil are available under reservation and for a fee. The visit is made by the owners who welcome visitors in a family atmosphere.  
Please contact (available on WhatsApp) for any enquiries.
If you are travelling in a big motor home coming from south(Peso da Regua), we advise to avoid the M593, but use the N313-2 instead.

title: (4625) Favões - Unnamed Road
description: River beach, very peaceful and cleaned. A lot of people camping over night. Ideal for relax, take sun and swimming. The access is steep not ideal for the biggest campervans.

title: (3600) Castro Daire - N228
description: Small dirt parking off the road. Surrounded by Eucalyptus trees. We just stopped to got for a walk, but for one night, it could be a nice, quiet spot.

title: (3600) Castro Daire - 1879 N228
description: Drinking water fountain well suited for filling water canisters. Large parking space.

title: (5110) Folgosa - N222
description:
Small parking bay beside the road. Great for picknick. For vans and small camper. 
Due to the road some traffic noise.

title: (4575-052) Alpendurada e Matos - F Avenida Francisco Sá Carneiro
title_short: (4575-052) Alpendurada e Matos - F Avenida Francisco Sá Carneiro
description: Large fairgrounds (except fairgrounds - Saturdays)

title: (5110) - CM1104
description: Ideal place for lovers of calm with breathtaking views of the vineyards and apple fields. End of paved road so no passage. (wind turbines nearby) We went up with a motorhome of 7,40m but beware of some turns that may require some maneuvering

title: (4575) Quebrada - 153 Rua de Barco do Souto
title_short: (4575) Quebrada - 153 Rua de Barco do Souto
description: Small parking lot with some picnic tables very quiet

title: (4575-010) - 10 Avenida de Miratâmega
description: Spacious parking, no camper size limit next to the Municipal Market and Continent Supermarket

title: (4575) - 636 Rua da Vista Alegre
description: Private villa that offers free water to all motorhomes. Enter the small door of the property and use the hose to supply water. No payment required. The owner provides water from his property to all motorhomes. (door n ° 604)

title: (4605) Real - 618 Rua Doutor Joaquim da Silva Cunha
title_short: (4605) Real - 618 Rua Doutor Joaquim da Silva Cunha
description: Nice little parking lot in paved ground Very quiet I only stayed for lunch but I'm sure we can stay the night No service hard this parking lot

address.street: 618 Rua Doutor Joaquim da Silva Cunha

title: (4540) Espiunca - EM505
description: Ground parking and boil, busy during the day and very quiet at night. Not very good entry. Ideal to access "the Paiva river footbridges"; spectacular infrastructure designed to take a walk of 8km enjoying a fantastic landscape. It is advisable to check out the entrance to the Tourism Office of Arouca beforehand

title: (4575-003) Várzea - 394 Rua da Cachorrela
description: Parking by Intermarché Alpendorada. Laundry, shop, and gas station.

title: (4575) - Caminho da Granja de Matos
description: Lazer Park of Alpendorada. Very good for a stopover, large car park, water point and toilets indicated on the map. Mini football pitch, basketball, fitness trail near the dam on the edge of the Tâmega. Possible night.

title: (3600) Castro Daire -
description:
Idyllic place by the river for swimming and barbecuing. Free of charge. Toilets available but were closed (May 2023). No waste containers installed at the moment. Quiet night, but well attended when the weather is bathing.
Enjoy nature!

title: (5050) Peso da Régua - N313-1
description: Great viewpoint over the Douro. Many picnic tables. Trees for shade. Public WC. No prohibitions, no fees. Very quiet. Excursion traffic on the weekend. Restaurant a few hundred meters away.

title: (4540) Canelas - R326-1
description: Top parking of paiva bridges. Perfect for sleeping. Very quiet at night. They do not pose any problems while sleeping

title: (3600) Pepim - N288
description: Old road overlooking a football field. a bit off the current road. In the middle of nature but without any particular charm. Helps out well for one night.

title: (4540) Espiunca - 12 Rua 1 de Maio
description: Water point

name: Casa Estêvão
title: (3660-328) Casa Estêvão
description:
This is a remote village that welcomes life. 
• Observe and feed the farm animals(sheep, goats, pig, rabbits, chickens, fishes)
• Picking a variety of fruits directly from the trees 
• Tasty products from the farm

title: (4575) - 266 Rua Conde Vale da Rica
description: Along the way without issue on the banks, possibility to park for the night. stand far enough away from the restaurants. some cars come make a half turn and sometimes stop a moment. large space at the end for the half round, no worries with our camping because 7, 5 m.

title: (4540) Meitriz - Beco da Costeira
description: Nice and calm spot just by the river and surrounded by nature.

title: (4540) - EM505
description: New area in Espiunca, at the beginning of the Paiva river walkways

title: (4540) Vilarinho - R326-1
description: Not allowed for cars longer than 5 meters. Furthermore, a very nice place on the water

title: (4575) Vitetos de Cima - 245 Rua Conde Vale da Rica
title_short: (4575) Vitetos de Cima - 245 Rua Conde Vale da Rica
description: View of the Douro, now in July / August is the entertainment of many young people. Afterwards this is an excellent quiet Camper spot. Lots of fish for the fish fanatics. Please note that you do not have to follow the GPS but the signs beach / paria Bitetos via the road N108-1, this is the route. Not via village this is for locals with small cars, we drive ourselves and there are no turning spots. Do not ignore the road signs!

title: (4575) - 50 Rua Conde Vale da Rica
description: Superb parking on the quays along the Douro in a small village. Ideal for a break, possible to spend the night but not tested.

title: (4575) Rio de Moinhos - 543 Rua Souto
description: Large parking lot, empty all day. At night a bit of passage because the young people meet here, but it remains calm. The view is very nice, and if you have any concerns there is a great mechanic nearby. Quite a few strays though, so my dogs spent quite a bit of time barking. There is a park 20min walk away, and the douro is 30min away. There is a hiking trail that starts from the town. Attention, no shade, spot exposed from 09:00 to evening. And quite difficult to access because narrow street and people park there. My cc is 2m15 wide, and 6.80 long: that was right.

title: (4550-364) Fornos - 520 EM502
description: Uncontrolled water. clear water. 2 fountains at the edge of the road.

title: (4540) - Rua da Igreja
description: Small place near the Paiva River

title: (4550) Fornos - N222
description: Very quiet area on the banks of the Douro River. It has public toilets with shower (they are closed at night), river beach with rental of kayaks and paddle surf, cafeteria / restaurant and swimming pools

title: (5000) Vila Real - 2-17 Rua Lugar da Fraga
title_short: (5000) Vila Real - 2-17 Rua Lugar da Fraga
description: Large parking paved quiet, a few trees, perfect to rest for a night. no service, nothing to visit, just the view of the big bridge over the gorges of the little river Corgo.

title: (5000-111) Guiães -
description: Corner in the middle of the pines on flat ground with a view of the village, ideal for one night

title: (4540) Alvarenga - Unnamed Road
description: Cross of Paradihna

title: () Pardelhas - N304
description: Superb corner in Do Alvao Park. Maximum two places on this site. In the middle of nature, at an altitude of 1000 meters. Water point.

title: (4550) Castelo de Paiva - 25 Rua Jean Tyssen
title_short: (4550) Castelo de Paiva - 25 Rua Jean Tyssen
description: Washing machine and dryer

title: (5000-651) Vila Real - N16 Rua de São Dinis
title_short: (5000-651) Vila Real - N16 Rua de São Dinis
description: Parking with easy access via avenida Carvalho Araujo. belvedere on the Corgo ravine.

title: (5000-105) Vila Real - 18 Rua Doutor Manuel de Arriaga
title_short: (5000-105) Vila Real - 18 Rua Doutor Manuel de Arriaga
description: Rangers did not allow us to camp in the nature reserve. The road to the cemetery was open and after driving around we came across this place. Bench across the street. Garbage bin nearby.

title: (5000-651) Vila Real - 58 Rua da Fonte Nova
title_short: (5000-651) Vila Real - 58 Rua da Fonte Nova
description: Next to the very calm primary school. 10 minutes walk from the city center.

title: (5000-651) Vila Real - 13 Praceta Dom João Evangelista
title_short: (5000-651) Vila Real - 13 Praceta Dom João Evangelista
description: Residential parking with plenty of free spaces, more or less flat and very close to the center. It is payable on weekdays (0.60 an hour until 7:00 p.m.) We have slept here without problems.

title: (4550) Sobrado - 91 Rua Emídio Navarro
description:
Very near small town center. A little unleveled. NOTE: it happens here each two week open market (6 and 21; when Sunday, anticipates to Saturday). Nice places to eat near.
Calm. Service spot - W corner aside white container - is wick to grey water discharge.

title: (5000) Galegos Da Serra - EM1214
description: Park/picnic place with magnificient view on Vila Real.

title: (4620) Rio Tinto - 342 N207-2
description: Simple parking 250 m from Caide train station to take the train to Pinhao. Departure 8:50 arrival 11:37. Return departure 16h23 arrival 18h25. The train runs along the Douro on 85% of the way, beautiful! And in the opposite direction Porto is 40 minutes.

title: (5000-573) Mesão Frio -
description: Parking very basic, but convenient for large vehicles, no shade. and close to the auto circuit (during the wtcr) for access to the paddocks.

title: (5000) Vila Real - 38 Avenida 5 de Outubro
description: Around the park and playground for children, there is room to park the motorhome. We did not spend the night because there was a student party for the carnival in a tent in the university area and there was a lot of noise but on another date that did not have the party, the place is very good, you cross the bridge and you are in the historic center, walking, in ten minutes you are there. The place that puts another partner we used to sleep but is far from the city.

title: (4615) - Rua Da Ribeirinha
description: Parque de Merendas. A picnic area, next to the river, perfect for spending the night in peace. There is a toilet, a BBQ and a sink.

title: (4550) São Martinho de Sardoura -
description: Good spot to spend the night. dead end street leading to the entrance to a derelict house. We had a quiet night. We can hear the traffic pick up on the N222 in the early morning but nothing disturbing.

title: (3660-097) São Pedro do Sul - CM1123
description: Small vantage point. Very nice view over the valley in which there is a small village. However, you can hear the wind turbines.

title: (3620) Leomil -
description: Close to the road with very little traffic, behind the pines. easy access by a path. very rustic but it helps.

title: (4575) Penafiel - 212 Avenida São Miguel
description: Intermarché Termas São Vicente (Penafiel - Porto)

title: (4550) Santa Maria de Sardoura - Variante à N224
title_short: (4550) Santa Maria de Sardoura - Variante à N224
description: Nice little corner at the edge of the water and in the shade for a midday stop.

title: (4575) - Rua São Tiago
description: The place is near a marina and located between two rivers, the beautiful Douro is the morning view on quite night. The are several places to stop the car, Sundays are quite busy.

title: (5000-542) Vila Real - Rua Actor Ruy de Carvalho
title_short: (5000-542) Vila Real - Rua Actor Ruy de Carvalho
description: Parking at the entrance to Parque do Corgo. In addition to shopping. Very peaceful place where we could spend 2 fantastic nights. Drinking water is available free of charge, but barrels are required for filling. No unloading points.

title: (4550) Real - Unnamed Road
description: Clay trail leading to what appears to be a church. No one on the horizon, the spot is relatively clean compared to what we have already seen in Portugal, and above all the view is breathtaking. Thank you for leaving the right impeccable, even if it means picking up some papers that are not yours.

name: Vila Real Camping
title: (5000-557) Vila Real Camping
description: The campsite is about 1 km from the town center on a hill with lots of trees. squares. There is everything you need. The place is clean and well managed. Very friendly welcome.

title: (4560-496) Penafiel - 285 Rua Província de Pontevedra
description: Quite a large parking lot in front of a sports field with about 25 spaces, also suitable for larger campers. Ideal for families with a skate park and playground. Directly opposite, very cheap and family-friendly pizzeria with its own play tower for children and air conditioning! We stood very quietly 1 night.

title: (4550) Real -
description: Very nice picnic area (height: ~640m) with four tables and two covered grill stations. There is a water point and toilets, but they are not always open. The view is breathtaking and there is also a great swing. Next to the square there is a small chapel and a small stage.

title: (5000-410) Vila Real - 16 Rua de Montezelos
description: Automatic laundromat! very clean and very practical. There is a monaural for the exchange of banknotes. Laundry is included. TV and free WiFi. Air conditioning can be parked in front near the electrical transformer

title: (5000) Vila Real -
description: Quiet place with a beautiful view. We stayed 2 nights and would definitely come back.
